page.title: 16POULTRY FARM (PURRELDEGGIE)
page.content: On every farm there are{4}units of sheds. Each end of the shed contains 20,000 chickens. There are at least {160,000}chickens on every farm. When the chicks arrive they are only 1 day old. Before they arrive, we have to prepare for their delivery, by filling each shed with wood shavings. The chickens are reared from when they are 1 day old to when they leave, approximately 9 weeks later, unless they contract{"Foul Pest"}a fatal disease common among chickens. To prevent disease spreading visiting vehicles are disinfected along with visitors footwear. After the chickens are sold we await another batch to start the process over again.
